projects.summary: Turkey’s long established, strong, domestic national brand: Ülker
detail: Ülker’, one of Turkey’s long-established, strong, domestic national brands, has a history dating back to 1944. Founded by the late Ülker brothers, Sabri and Asım in Eminönü’s Nohutçu Han, the strength of the Ülker brand has grown throughout time to the present day.

Representing both the traditional and the future at the same time, Ülker is a brand that proudly adapts to the sociological and economic developments of the society where it was born, such that, Ülker’s renewal and change are like a never ending-journey.

Ülker is at the very heart of society, accompanying happy family moments and feelings of trust, sincerity, and closeness. Ülker’s communication channels with its consumers are always open, and it prioritizes the principles of transparency in all its activities.

detail: Training and research hospitals across Turkey, including faculty and Institute of Forensic Medicine, including medical, dental and pharmaceutical fields was implemented for all institutions and programs that carry out specialty training activities.

projects.summary: The Individual Pension System (IPS) lets you save up to maintain your living standards during retirement by investing your savings in the long-term.
detail: The Individual Pension System (“IPS” for short) is a private pension system that provides an income to maintain living standards during retirement through the long-term investment of the savings people make during their active careers.
People participate in the system voluntarily to benefit from an income in addition to the pension income provided by the social security system.

gallery.title: 10 Good Reasons to Enter the IPS

projects.summary: OYAK Göksupark is a candidate to be the most ambitious project that blends modern life with the colors of nature in Ankara.
detail: The house is where the family is. Welcome to OYAK Göksupark, which consists of 1876 residences with different width options from 1 + 1 to 4 + 1, right next to Göksu Park, which is the favorite living area of Ankara that combines green and blue.
For your peaceful and happy days, we build with the strength we receive from our family bonds.

projects.summary: Pelin Güley Interior Architecture, founded in 2011; interior and furniture design, project planning, application control and application services.
detail: Pelin Güley Interior Architecture, founded in 2011; interior and furniture design, project planning, application control and application services. From its establishment until today, it has realized interior projects in residential, office, sales office, public building, embassy building, hotel, store, restaurant, cafe areas.

The place has adopted the principle of designing up-to-date but timeless spaces with a brutalist approach without giving up the lean, clear, natural way with the elements of functionality, necessity which is similar to the identity of the user.
Designed spaces, furnitures are analyzed with fine and meticulous details. It has a solution-oriented working discipline that is suitable for today's conditions.

projects.summary: Medyasoft Consulting & Training Inc. continues to deliver successful projects for the digital transformation of enterprises, fully aware of the responsibilities that comes with being a trustworthy business partner
detail: Medyasoft Consulting & Training Inc. continues to deliver successful projects for the digital transformation of enterprises, fully aware of the responsibilities that comes with being a trustworthy business partner.

Medyasoft has been providing end-to-end, value-added solutions ranging from digital agency services to customer experience management, enterprise management systems to outsourcing services to hundreds of corporate clients since 1999.

projects.summary: I know you! You are not the man of such abnormal movements, you like classic. What is nice for you is always the original.
detail: I know you! You are not the man of such abnormal movements, you like classic. What is nice for you is always the original. You do not make modifications to the classic car, you also do not like unnatural makeup in women.
But when it is the place, you are completely crazy, opening the coat in ice cold weather and walking is your event.
Classic is good good ... That's why, this iLOVE is for you!
